name: L'Ami du Miel
description:
L'ami du Miel

Welcome to L’Ami du Miel, a cute French bakery and café owned by the kind-hearted brown bear, Darrell Vion! Come on in for sweet treats, a warm drink, and a wild cast of characters. Every day is a new start when you've got a good cup of coffee!

L’Ami du Miel was created in 48-Hours for Northeastern University's Slice of Jam 2022 Creators

Gabriel Reid  Writer

Caroline Burzynski  Writer

Emily Huang  Character Concept & Prop Artist

Wendy Jia  Background and Character Illustrator

Lauren Aquino  UI Designer & Title Artist

Matt Dean   Programmer

William Perrine  Composer & Sound Designer

Sound Effects from Freesound.org
